thread.title: Global Guardian Adds Panama To Service Area
thread.title_full: Global Guardian Adds Panama To Service Area - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Global Guardian Adds Panama To Service Area
text:
Global Guardian
MCLEAN, Va. , Aug. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The international security firm Global Guardian has added Panama to the list of countries where it provides its comprehensive suite of security services, including personnel tracking, a full range of personnel based security and executive protection services, medical support and transportation, travel intelligence and emergency response and evacuation services.
The firm's security and emergency response coverage includes Panama's largest cities and most popular tourist destinations such as Panama City, Colon, Gamboa, Boquete, David, and Santa Clara.
About Global Guardian
Global Guardian is a McLean, VA based international security firm that provides is clients with access to a comprehensive suite of security services. Its capabilities include personnel tracking supported by a dedicated 24-hour Operation Center, a full range of personnel based security and executive protection services, medical support and transportation, travel intelligence and emergency response and evacuation services in over 40 markets globally. Global Guardian's suite of risk mitigation services provides organizations with innovative and cost-effective solutions to help them protect their staff and business operations around the world.
http://www.globalguardian.com
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20141130/161411LOGO
